feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.0.5
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Sorts services in swarm view  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3096 (20867)
  • Tries to use swarm node id if exists then machine-id  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3097 (c5771)
  • Removes orphaned containers. fixes #3077  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3098 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3077 (5af61)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Missed a few anlaytics that were not respecting no analytics flag  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3099 (ec31d)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.0.6
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Auto links url for simple logs. fixes #3063  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3100 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3063 (3541c)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes broken host info for remote hosts. fixes #3103  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3103 (6c153)
  • Uses correct int size for memory  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3115 (01afa)
  • Fixes broken auto redirect. see #3123  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3129 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3123 (aa655)
  • Fetching more should only allow for one and abort if one is already in progress. fixes #3113  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3118 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3113 (5d901)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3106 (8fec4)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3111 (c5e3f)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3112 (59e0b)
  • Update dependency tailwindcss to ^3.4.5  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3117 (987c0)
  • Update dependency @iconify-json/material-symbols to ^1.1.85  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3121 (565bf)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.0.7
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes first few lines not showing up. fixes #3139  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3142 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3139 (4aa31)

   üèé Performance

  • Fixes an issue with too many containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3144 (082be)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.1.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Updates agents to be more resilient by reconnecting. also adds big performance issues in swarm mode with little updates to the UI.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3145 (3a988)

   üèé Performance

  • Limits maximum items to be fetched when scrolling up. see #3122  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3151 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3122 (cbed7)
  • Only loads selected locales  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3152 (19d03)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.1.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Uses desktop menu instead for mobile menu  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3153 (989f0)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes default fallback not working. fixes #3154  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3156 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3154 (c91ad)
    View changes on GitHub
